title: Music Player
description: This challenge is great to practice your JavaScript skills. The challenge is to create a simple music player app that tests your data management with JavaScript.

userStories.content: Create a music player app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create the basic structure.
Add image, title, author, progress bar, player button,... according to the design.
Users should be able to play and stop the current song.
Users should be able to go to next and previous songs.
Users should be able to change play time with the progress bar.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
